p: Each test solution (1 mL) was added to 2,2-diphenyl-1-picrylhydrazyl (DPPH) solution (4 mL, 0.004% methanolic solution). The sample absorbance was noted at 517 nm after 30-min incubation at room temperature in the dark. Results are expressed as milligrams of trolox equivalent per gram of extract (TE/g sample) [ 19].
